english_example_sentence: If we didn't live close to the city, we would have a quieter life
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не жили близко к городу, у нас была бы тихая жизнь
turkish_example_sentence: Biz şehre yakın yaşamasak daha sakin bir hayatımız olurdu
